Title: Provides that the sale of real property owned by the N.Y. city housing authority to a private entity must be approved by the state legislature
Summary: Provides that the sale of real property owned by the NYC housing authority to a private entity must be approved by the state legislature.
LawCode: Ren §§402-a & 402-b to be §§402-b & 402-c, §402-c to be §402-h, §402-c to be §402-i, add §402-a, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to regulating the conveyance of certain public housing
